Literature.Title: Engineering increased stability in the antimicrobial peptide pediocin PA-1.
Literature.Author: Johnsen L, Fimland G, Eijsink V, Nissen-Meyer J

Literature.Title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and conformational analysis of the class IIa bacteriocin pediocin PA-1 and analogs thereof.
Literature.Author: Bédard F, Hammami R, Zirah S, Rebuffat S, Fliss I, Biron É

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Latilactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714(MIC=0.0001µM),Loigolactobacillus coryniformis subsp. torquens NCDO 2740(MIC=0.0001µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCDO 581(MIC=0.0002µM),Carnobacterium maltaromaticum UI49(MIC=0.0006µM),Pediococcus pentosaceus FBB63B(MIC=0.0002µM),Pediococcus acidilactici NCDO 1859(MIC=0.006µM),Leuconostoc mesenteroides subsp. dextranicum NCDO 529(MIC=0.010µM),Listeria ivanovii HPB 28(MIC=0.0017µM),Listeria monocytogenes LSD 530(MIC=0.0068µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=0.0135µM),Pediococcus acidilactici UL5(no activity data)
